languages.text: "Разумно скрывать свое прошлое и тайны своих братьев от чужака, но постыдно — от друга. Спрашивай".
"It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."
languages.original_text: "Разумно скрывать свое прошлое и тайны своих братьев от чужака, но постыдно — от друга. Спрашивай".

traits.locale_text: "It is wise to hide one's past and the secrets of one's brothers from a stranger, but shameful to hide them from a friend. Ask away."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is wise to hide one's past and the secrets of one's brothers from a stranger, but shameful to hide them from a friend. Ask away."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is wise to hide one's past and the secrets of one's brothers from a stranger, but shameful to hide them from a friend. Ask away."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “向陌生人隐瞒过去秘密是明智之举，但若是向朋友隐瞒这些，则是可耻的事情。尽管问吧。”
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: “向陌生人隐瞒自己的过去与兄弟的秘密是明智之举，但若是向朋友隐瞒这些，则是可耻的事情。尽管问吧。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es de sabios ocultar el pasado propio a los desconocidos, pero ocultárselo a un{mf||a} amig{mf|o|a} es una vergüenza. Pregunte, pues».
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: «Es de sabios ocultar el pasado propio y las hazañas de los hermanos a un desconocido, pero ocultárselo a un{mf||a} amig{mf|o|a} es una vergüenza. Pregunte, pues».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の過去やを他人に隠すのは賢明だが、友人に隠すのは恥ずべきことだ。言ってみろ」
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の過去やを他人に隠すのは賢明だが、友人に隠すのは恥ずべきことだ。言ってみろ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist weise, die eigene Vergangenheit vor Fremden zu verbergen, aber schmachvoll, dies vor Freunden zu tun. Fragt."
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist weise, die eigene Vergangenheit und die Geheimnisse seiner Brüder vor Fremden zu verbergen. Aber schmachvoll, sie vor Freunden zu verbergen. Fragt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il est sage de cacher le passé à un étranger, mais honte à celui qui le cache à un ami. Demandez donc. »
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: « Il est sage de cacher le passé et les secrets de ses frères à un étranger, mais honte à celui qui les cache à un ami. Demandez donc. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

languages.text: "Geçmişini yabancılara anlatmamak, bilgece bir davranıştır. Dostundan saklamaksa utanç verici bir eylemdir. Buyur, sor."
languages.original_text: "It is wise to hide one's past from a stranger, but shameful to hide it from a friend. Ask away."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişini yabancılara anlatmamak bilgece bir davranıştır. Fakat dostundan saklamak, utanç verici bir eylemdir. Buyur, sor."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
